topic.title: Useful & diverse linux based software
topic.body: Desktop, Cloud, Server, IoT, and any other form of deployment. Which is y'all favorite?

1580580478_129GZPA7VpPa3YaRRW2ani34CaowY.body: The zeronet github page is a good starting point if you dont know coding, it'll guide you on whats necessary for your website

1580487512_1Fi8DX6DCYM65akSho5nuAZRmKxn9.body:

coding knowledge is required with those tools tho

1580594957_1AEx7ASy4xvEkpjJKweTVD2hnsKmP.body:
Really appreciate everybody dropping their fire software choices you all have been really helpful to myself and plenty others! Keep dropping knowledge, making the internet a safe community!
I am a docker fanatic. Not for the quick tempered bc it takes a little bit of a learning curve to fully understand BUT once you do, the versatility of it will make you fall in love lol
Hey ladies and gents! Just wanted to drop a new idea I had... Personally it would be cool to keep in touch...... https://discord.gg/N4jxyZ

1582356450_12tcdM86TcZQeHEsSea3kTdTiExBK.body: I was a resident of dale city VA so im interested in helping any way i can. I haven't heard of any route 29 disappearance although twitter always has a missing picture posted about every month now. If you could share some of your research with me I'd love to help!

Here guys, check out this link https://coldcasecrimes.org/contact.html.
I'm waiting for a response about working some cases but I think its a legit resource to help with our research.

1583235865_1MTiDbYKVBHvcZRH4AikT2PbpUGBT.body: Covid-19 is from the melted icebergs. Since the powers that be didn't take global warming serious mother nature showing us how real it is! Unlike most illnesses and deformities and infections, Covid-19 wasn't created in a lab with a fail-safe vaccine. Hopefully this gets climate change into the political debates!

1589664235_16Fw7LqBDEgoFYTkiJBsywYJRtoRR.body: Everyone should check out the Raspberry Pi and create their own vpn server to keep their browsing habits private! This is the most beginner friendly tutorial I could find  ---> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=15VjDVCISj0&list=PL4Vy6IQzsbLdAXw5WfrJ-kTyNAxfCCE4k&index=7&pbjreload=10
